stimulusHtml: Residents of Maryland’s Third District could legally challenge the redistricting of the area shown on the map because they identify it as being
choicesHtml: a sovereign boundary created to promote the establishment of an independent state
part of the federal state, which grants proportional representation in the United States House of Representatives
a maritime boundary that extends out into the waters of the Chesapeake Bay
a gerrymandered boundary that guarantees a political party’s seat within the United States House of Representatives
part of an autonomous region that limits the State of Maryland’s control over the district.
